Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We note your affirmation of the Harper code and your commitment to preserving the balance and honoring the past. The insidious nature of the threats we combat often require a subtle approach, which we hope to channel your talents towards.

An agent will introduce you to local cells and our latest ciphers shortly.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
May the shining light in darkness never go out.

Welcome [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are pleased to hear of your initiation. Take pride in your willing service, for Toril wallows yet in defiance of the inevitable. The ascension of our draconic masters will be great, and so will our rewards.

Naught will be left save shattered thrones with no rulers.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
But the dead dragons shall rule the world entire...

Hail [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
You have demonstrated your worth to the Brotherhood, and we welcome you to join our ranks. Our dedication to the Art can be distracting, but we pragmatics keep in mind that Art is power,and power comes in many forms.

We expect your presence at the Host Tower shortly.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Coin is King in the North.

Salutations [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
In light of your cunning and determination, the consortium extends an offer of membership. Know that the familial ties we foster are no mere formality. Rewards await the loyal, and death to traitors.

Burn after reading.
Signed, The Kiss of Steel in Darkness
